message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While I can't quite meet you at $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
